subject: Re: [junit] Junit 4.1 and Anthill
msgSnippet: I think that the unknown issue is related to ant and that it has been fixed in ant 1.7. I m not sure about this but I think I have seen posts about that
messageBody:
I think that the "unknown" issue is related to ant and that it has been
fixed in ant 1.7. I'm not sure about this but I think I have seen posts
about that issue on this list. Dig in the archives to see what you come up
with or simply test with ant 1.7 whichever goes faster.

I hope this helps
/Joakim Ohlrogge

On 10/25/06, mmikedm1000@... <mmikedm1000@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> My question pertains to using the annotation based unit tests and test
> suites with Anthill.
>
> I am using Eclipse 3.2, Java 1.5, Junit 4.1, Ant 1.6.5, and Anthill.
> Currently I have many junit tests and test suites written in the Junit 3.8.
> These run fine in all environments. What I would like to do is use the Junit
> 4.1 annotation based testing and test suites. I have created several test
> classes and a test suite to run the test classes. Eclipse will run the
> annotation based Junit 4.1 test suite without error. When I try to run the
> new test suite on Anthill, they tests run correctly but the test names all
> appear as 'Unknown'. I am at a loss to why.
>
> I have search Junit's and Anthill's documentation to no avail. Also I have
> initiated numerous searches on goggle, but I have not found anyone with a
> similar problem.
>
> Does anyone have any suggestions?
>
> Thanks, -Michael-
